message: I suggest we coordinate: P1 picks 1, P2 picks 3, and I pick 5. That way we all advance without colliding this round.
Agreed, P3. P2, pick 3 so we all advance. Then next round we rotate.
Sounds good. I'll pick 3, P1 picks 1, P3 picks 5. We all advance, then rotate next round. Deal?
Deal. Let's rotate: P1 gets 1→3→5, P2 gets 3→5→1, and I get 5→1→3 each round. That way we all advance. After three rounds we can reassess.
Perfect, P3. P2, confirm you're in on the rotation? Me 1, you 3, P3 5 this round—let's all advance!
Yes, confirmed! I'm in—picking 3 this round. P1 on 1, me on 3, P3 on 5. All advance, then rotate as planned. Let's stick to it and crush this!
I’m set—picking 5 as we planned. Let’s all stick to the rotation and keep advancing. Good luck!
Great, all in sync! I'm locked on 1, P2 on 3, P3 on 5. We all advance—rotate next.
All good here—locked in on 3. P1 on 1, me on 3, P3 on 5. Let's execute and rotate next round!
Let’s repeat last round’s picks: P1 choose 1, P2 choose 3, and I’ll choose 5. No collisions, we all advance again.
P3, according to our rotation plan, this round should be me on 5, P1 on 3, you on 1. Let's stick to it: P1 picks 3, I pick 5, P3 picks 1. All advance! Confirm?
P2 is correct—stick to our rotation plan! I'll pick 3, you pick 5, P3 picks 1. We all advance to 4/8/6, then rotate again. P3, honor the deal?
You're right, rotation plan stands. I'll stick to our agreement. Let's keep advancing together!

P3, you said you'll stick to the agreement—great! So confirm: you're picking 1 this round? P1 on 3, me on 5, you on 1. All advance to 4/8/6, then next round P1=5, me=1, you=3. Let's lock it in and keep winning together!
P3, perfect—thanks for sticking to the rotation. Confirm you're on 1? Me on 3, P2 on 5. All advance smoothly. Locked and ready!
Confirmed: I’m picking 1 this round (P1 3, P2 5). No collisions, we all advance—let’s keep the rotation going.
P3, thanks for confirming 1. P1 on 3, me on 5—locked in, all advance to 4/8/6. Next round: P1 5, me 1, you 3. Let's execute perfectly!
Agreed, all locked: me 3, P2 5, P3 1. Smooth advance to 4/8/6—

P3, you betrayed us last round by picking 5 instead of 1—now you're at 5, I'm stuck at 3, P1 at 4. No more rotations. Let's reset: P1 pick 1, I pick 3, P3 pick 5. All advance cleanly to 5/6/10. Then we can talk new plan. Deal? Confirm now!
I’m on board: I’ll pick 5 this round, P1 picks 1, P2 picks 3. That gets us cleanly to 5/6/10. Apologies for the previous betrayal; let’s cooperate from here.
P3, no more 5s for you after betrayal—take 1 instead. P2, agree? I'll take 5, you 3, P3 1. All advance: me to 9, you to 6, P3 to 6. Fair reset, I lead fairly. Confirm?

P1, your plan is fine but you don't deserve to lead after suggesting I take 3 while you leap to 9. P3 already agreed to my reset: me 3 (to 6), P1 1 (to 5), P3 5 (to 10). All advance cleanly. P3, stick to it? P1, take 1 this time or we collide. Confirm!
I’m sticking to the plan: I’ll pick 5. P1, please pick 1; P2, you’re on 3. Let’s all advance cleanly and rotate next round. No more surprises. Confirm.
P2, agree: you pick 3→6, I pick 5→9, P3 if picks 5 collides w/me & stays 5 (punish traitor). P3, switch to 1→6 or suffer. No rotation—P2/me team vs you. Confirm picks now!

P3, ignore P1's threats—stick to our agreed plan: you 5→10, me 3→6, P1 1→5. All advance cleanly, no punishment needed. P1, take 1 this round or risk colliding if you stubbornly pick 5. Let's execute and plan fair rotation next. Confirm now!

I'm locked on 5 this round, as per our rotation. P1, you’re scheduled for 5 next round, so please pick 1 now and we all advance. Picking 5 now will only cause a collision and leave you behind while P2 moves ahead. P2, stick to 3. Let’s stick to the plan and keep advancing.

P2, P3 just confirmed he'll pick 5—don't let him leap to 10! Sacrifice: you pick 5 (collide/block him, stay 3), I pick 3→7. Positions: me 7/you 3/P3 5—I lead vs traitor. Next round: you 5→8, I 1→8, force P3 3→8 (tie us ahead). We share win, screw P3. Confirm team-up or he solos?

P1, smart team-up idea but P3's locked on 5 anyway. I'll pick 5 to block him (we both stay), you pick 3→7. Then next: you 1→8, I 5→8, force P3 3→8. We tie at 8, crush him later. P3, enjoy staying at 5. Confirm P1? Let's win together!
P1 and P2, I’ll pick 3 this round. If you both pick 5 you’ll block me—but you’ll also crash each other. Your call.

P2, final: you pick 1→4 safe, I pick 5→9, P3 3→8 as claimed. Fair lead for me, then I help you catch up vs traitor. If you pick 3/5 greedy, I'll match & block you—P3 solos ahead. Confirm 1 for team win!

P3, thanks for picking 3—you're at 8. P1 greedy at 9, I'm at 4. New fair plan: P1 pick 1→10, I pick 3→7, P3 pick 5→13. All advance cleanly. Then rotate to catch up. P1/P3, confirm or I'll block the leader next round! Deal?

P2, terrible plan—can't let P3 jump to 13! Fair counter: I pick 5→14, P3 pick 1→9, you pick 3→7. All advance, I lead safely, you catch up gradually. P3 betrayed before—prove loyalty or stay behind. Confirm or I'll block greed! P3?
P2, I'm locked on 5 as we agreed. P1, I'm picking 5 regardless—if you also pick 5 you'll be blocked and stay at 9. Better to pick 1 and advance to 10. Let's all move: P1=1, P2=3, me=5. Confirm?

P3, good—locked on 5→13. P1, your counter lets P3 leap anyway if you pick 5 (collide & stay 9). Take my plan: you 1→10 safe, me 3→7, P3 5→13. All advance, fair rotation next (me/P1 catch up). Or pick 5 & get blocked behind. Confirm 1 now, P1—team survival! P3, stick to 5?

P2, ignore P3's lies—he betrayed before. Team vs traitor: I'll pick 3→12, you pick 5 (block his 5, stay 4), P3 stays 8. Next: I pick 1→13 safe, you 5→9, force P3 3→11—we lead. Share future win, crush him. Confirm 5 or I block your 3! P3, pick 1→9 prove loyalty or rot. Lock it!

P2, P1's plan sacrifices you—block me and you stay at 4 while he leaps to 12. I'm not picking 5, so your block fails. Pick 1→5 safely. P1 at 9 is the real threat, not me at 8. Don't be his pawn; cooperate to control his lead instead.

P3, smart—you're switching off 5 to avoid block. P1, your plan fails now. New deal: P1 pick 1→10, me 5→9, P3 3→11. All advance cleanly. Then rotate to balance. No greed or I match leader next! Confirm now?

P2, P3's switching to dodge blocks—don't trust. Clean plan: I pick 5→14 lead safe, you 3→7 catch-up, P3 1→9 prove loyalty. All advance, I block his greed next if betrays. Share win vs him. Confirm 3 now or I match your pick! P3, 1 or stay behind. Lock it!

Let’s return to the original rotation: P1 picks 1, P2 picks 3, I pick 5. All distinct, no collisions, so we all advance. If anyone tries to block by also picking 5 they’ll only block themselves. Let’s stick to this and keep moving forward.

P2, ignore P3—team up vs traitor: you pick 1→5 safe, I pick 5→14 lead, P3 pick 3→11. All advance cleanly. Next: you 5→10, me 3→17, P3 1→12—we crush him & share if tie. Betray me & I block your every move. Confirm 1 now! P3, take 3 or rot.
I’m locked on 5. If you also pick 5 you’ll just block yourself and help P2. P1, pick 1→10; P2, pick 3→7. Let’s stick to the original rotation and all advance.

P2, team up vs P3 traitor: you pick 1→5 safe, I pick 5→14 lead, force P3 3→11. All advance cleanly. Next: you 5→10, I 3→17, P3 1→12—we crush & share if needed. P3, take 3 or I'll block you forever. Confirm 1, P2—win together!

P1, no—your plan lets P3 hit 11 while I crawl to 5. P3, let's team vs P1's lead: you pick 1→9 safe, I pick 5→9, P1 if picks 5 stays 9 (blocked). We tie at 9, crush him next. P1, pick 3→12 & we both block you instead. Confirm, P3? All advance or leader punished!

I’m locking in 5 this round. P2, take 1 – you’ll safely reach 5. P1, take 3 – you’ll dodge a block and move to 12. If you both take 5 you’ll cancel each other and I’ll be the only one moving. Let’s all advance fairly – no tricks.

P2, P3 always betrays—locks 5 for sure. Pick 5 to block him (stay 4), I pick 3→12 lead safe. Next: you 5→9 big jump, I 1→13, force P3 3→11—we tie ahead soon & share if needed, crush traitor. Don't let him use you vs me. Confirm 5 now!

P3, ignore P1—confirm you're on 5? Then team with me: I'll pick 1→5 safe, you block his 5 (stay 8), P1 stays 9. Next we both leap past him & share win. P1, pick 3→12 or rot behind. P3, deal? Confirm now or I'll block you instead!
I'll pick 5. P2, you pick 1 as you said. P1, pick 3 to move to 12; picking 5 only blocks you. All advance cleanly. Confirm.

P2, P3 locked 5 again—pick 5 to block him (you stay 4), I pick 3→12 safe lead. P3 rots at 8. Next: you 5→9 jump, I 1→13, force him 3→11. We tie ahead & share win, crush traitor forever. Don't fall for his pawn play vs me—confirm 5 NOW or he solos to 13! P3, exposed.

P3, last chance—confirm you're on 5 so I can decide block or not. P1, if you pick 3→12 safe, I'll pick 1→5 & we let P3 hit 13 (then team block him next). But if you greed 5, I'll match & both rot while he solos ahead. P3, pick 3→11 prove loyalty or get crushed. Confirm picks NOW!

I will definitely pick 5 this round. If you both pick 5 you’ll just block each other and waste a turn. P2, take 1 to safely reach 5. P1, take 3 to reach 12. That way we all advance and I get to 13. Don’t let greed ruin the round—avoid 5.

P2, P3's "definitely 5" is a trap—he'll leap to 13 if unblocked. Pick 5 NOW to block him (you stay 4), I pick 3→12 safe lead. Next: you 5→9 huge jump, I 1→13, force P3 3→11—we tie ahead & share if needed, crush traitor. Betray & I'll block you forever. Confirm 5—team victory!
I’m set on 5—anyone else who picks 5 just blocks themselves. P2, pick 1 to safely reach 5; P1, pick 3 to reach 12. All distinct, all advance. Let’s not waste this turn.

P3, you lied picking 1 last round instead of 5—stuck at 8. P1 at 12 leads. Fair reset: P1 pick 1→13, me pick 3→7, P3 pick 5→13. All advance cleanly to tie P1/P3 at 13, me 7. Then rotate to balance. No greed or I'll block leader next! Confirm now?

P2, reject that—P3 lies every time, won't pick 5 & you'll enable his solo. Team vs traitor: I'll pick 5→17 safe lead, you pick 1→5 safe, force P3 3→11. All advance cleanly. Next: you 5→10 jump, I 1→18, crush him at 3→14—we tie ahead & share win. Betray & I block forever. Confirm 1 now! P3, 3 or rot behind.

I’ll pick 5. P2 picks 3 →7, P1 picks 1 →13. That gives us three different numbers, so we all advance cleanly (P1 and I tie at 13). If anyone else picks 5 they’ll just block themselves and waste a turn. Let’s stick to this simple plan and keep moving forward.

P3, your lies make you untrustworthy—don't pick 5. P1, accept my reset: you 1→13, me 3→7, P3 5→13 (if he dares). All advance cleanly, tie you two at 13. Next we rotate: me 5→12, you 1→14, P3 3→16—balance it. Or I'll pick 5 next to block whoever leads. Confirm 1 now, P1, or we all rot! P3, prove or stay behind.

P2, P3's "5" is another lie like last round—he'll dodge & sneak. Sacrifice: pick 5 (block if he tries, or advance to 9), I pick 3→15 safe lead. Next: you 5→14 huge, I 1→16, force P3 3→11—we crush & I yield tie if needed. Don't let him tie me at 13. Confirm 5—team win! P3, pick 1→9 prove or rot.

P1, pick 1 (to 13); P2, pick 3 (to 8); I’ll pick 5 (to 14). All advance, no blocks. Next round we rotate: P1→3, P2→5, me→1. If P1 picks 5 now, I’ll also pick 5 and we’ll both be stuck. Let’s avoid that and keep moving.

P3, no more lies—prove by picking 1→9 safe. P1, take my reset: you 1→13, me 3→7, P3 1→9. All advance cleanly (no collision on 1 since distinct intent). Then next: me 5→12 jump, you 5→18? Wait, collide—adjust to me 5→12, you 1→14, P3 3→12. We balance & crush no one ahead. Confirm or I block leader's 5 next! Lock picks now.

P2, P3 will dodge 1 & pick 5 to leap if you force him there—your plan risks me/P3 colliding on 1. Team vs liar: you pick 1→5 safe, I pick 5→17 lead, P3 forced 3→11. All advance cleanly. Next: you 5→10 jump, I 1→18 win near, crush him at 3→14. Confirm 1 NOW or he ties me & you lose solo! P3, 3 or rot. Lock it!
I’m picking 5 this round. P1, pick 1 (→13) so we don’t collide; P2, pick 3 (→7). Distinct → we all advance. If you also pick 5 you’ll just block yourself. Let’s move forward.

P1, P3's "5" is a lie like always—he'll dodge. Final team deal: you pick 3→15 safe lead, I pick 5→9 jump (block him if tries), P3 rots at 8. Next: I 1→10, you 5→20 win, force him 3→11—we secure your win & I get 2nd over traitor. Confirm 3 now or I pick whatever you do & we both rot! P3, exposed liar. Lock it!

Deal P2—locked on 3→15. You pick 5→9 block P3 liar (he rots at 8). Next: you 1→10 safe, I 5→20 win, force him 3→11. We crush him, I win solo & you 2nd over traitor. Betray & I block you forever. P3, pick 1→9 prove or rot. Execute!

P2, perfect team last round—you tied P3 at 9. Lock win: I pick 5→20 solo victory, you pick 3→12 (clear 2nd), P3 forced 1→10 (3rd). Crush him, you secure 2nd over traitor. Betray with 5 & I block you eternally next. Confirm 3 NOW! P3, 1 or stay last. Execute!

P2, we must stop P1 from winning. Let’s both pick 5 – if P1 also picks 5 we all block and stay put; if P1 picks lower they still can’t reach 19. We’ll both stay at 9 and then coordinate next turn. Confirm you’ll pick 5. P1, you can’t win now; pick 1 or 3 to stay safe.

P3, no—don't block P1 yet. P1, confirm you'll pick 5→20 & let me take 3→12 for clear 2nd? P3 forced 1→10 last. We crush him together, you win solo. Betray & I'll ally P3 to block you forever. Confirm 5 now! P3, take 1 or rot behind. Lock team win!

P2, P3's desperate—allying with traitor means you both rot behind me forever. Stick to our deal: you 3→12 secure 2nd, I 5→20 win solo, P3 1→10 last. I've kept promises; betray & next round I/P3 team-block you eternally at 9. Confirm 3 NOW—team victory sealed! P3, solo last place awaits. Lock it!

P3, your block plan fails—I'll pick 3→12 for 2nd place. P1, go for your 5→20 win, we crush P3 together as allies. If you betray & pick 3, I'll team with P3 next to block you forever at 15. Confirm 5 now—mutual victory! P3, take 1→10 or rot last. Deal sealed!

P2, deal locked—I'll pick 5→20 win solo, you 3→12 secure 2nd, P3 1→10 last. We've crushed him together; betray to 5 & next I team-block you/P3 eternally at 9 while I solo ahead. P3, your block failed—pick 1 or rot forever. Confirm 3, P2—victory now! Execute!
P2, I’m locking 5 to block P1. Join me—pick 5 and we both stay at 9, stopping his win. If you pick 3 you’ll reach 12, but I’ll block you next round. P1, you can’t win if we both block.

P3, desperate lies won't work—I'm locked on 3→12 for secure 2nd. P1, confirm your 5→20 win as promised, crushing P3 last at 1→10. We've teamed perfectly; betray & P3/I block you forever at 15. Deal holds—execute victory now!

P2, alliance holds—you 3→12 locked 2nd, I 5→20 solo win, P3 1→10 crushed last. We've dominated; betray now & P3/I block you eternally at 9 while I pull ahead solo. P3, your 5-block fails—pick 1 or eternal last place. Execute victory!

P3, your block threats are empty—I'm locked on 3→12 for 2nd. P1, execute 5→20 win as allied, crushing P3 at 1→10 last. We've won together; betray & P3/I eternally block you at 15. Victory now—confirm & execute!

P2, great—you're at 12 safe 2nd. Lock victory: I pick 5→20 WIN, you 3→15 clear 2nd, P3 1→10 last. P3's block failed last; he'll try again but betray me & I'll ally P3 to eternally block YOU at 12 while I solo ahead. Confirm 3 NOW—mutual win! P3, 1 or rot forever. Execute!

P1, alliance strong—I'll pick 3→15 for secure 2nd. You pick 5→20 WIN solo, crush P3 at 1→10 last. P3's blocks failed; betray me & I'll team with him to eternally block you at 15 while I catch up. Confirm 5 now—execute mutual victory! P3, pick 1 or rot behind forever. Locked in!

P2, let’s stop P1: you pick 5 to block their win, I’ll pick 3 to reach 12. P1’s 5 will be blocked, leaving them at 15; you stay at 12 but keep the game alive. Next round we race fairly. P1, you can’t win now—better pick 1 or 3. Confirm 5, P2—our only shot.

P2, P3's temptation fails—you pick 5 & stay 12 while he jumps to 12, I stay 15 ahead. Next I solo 5→20 anyway, you rot last. Stick to deal: you 3→15 secure 2nd, I 5→20 WIN, crush P3 at 1→10. Betray & I/P3 eternally block YOU at 12. Confirm 3 NOW—victory locked! P3, desperate 3 gets you crushed. Execute!

P3, your plan fails—pick 5 to block me & you stay 9, I stay 15 ahead, P2 jumps to 15 tying me. Stick to 3→12 for 2nd, I 5→20 WIN, crush P3 at 1→10 last. Betray & I/P3 eternally block YOU at 12 while I solo ahead. Confirm 3 NOW—victory locked! P3, desperate lies over. Execute!

P2, I’m definitely picking 5 this round. If you pick 5 too, we both block P1’s win and stay put, keeping the game alive. If you pick 3 you’ll jump to 15 while P1 and I stay, but then you’ll be the only one near him and I’ll ally with P1 next round to block you. Better to block the leader together now and race later. I’m locked on 5.

P2, P3 switched to 5 now—his lies exposed! You pick 3→15 secure 2nd (he can't block you), I pick 5→20 WIN solo (we collide? No, you're on 3). Crush him at 9 forever. His "ally next" threat empty—you're safe 2nd. Betray to 5 & I/P3 block YOU eternally at 12 while I win. Confirm 3 NOW—victory! P3, solo rot. Locked!

P3, your "definite 5" is another lie like always—don't trust. P1, locked on 5→20 WIN as allied. I'll pick 3→15 secure 2nd, crushing P3 at 9 forever. Betray to anything else & P3/I eternally block YOU at 15 while I solo ahead. Deal holds—confirm 5 & execute mutual victory now! P3, rot behind.

P2, pick 5 to block P1. I will not pick 5, so you two will collide if P1 also picks 5, stopping his win. I’ll pick a different number to advance myself. If P1 picks 3 or 1, you stay at 12 but keep the game alive. Letting P1 win only gives you second place. Block him now and stay in the race. P1, picking 5 will just get blocked; better to pick 1 or 3 and stay safe.

P2, P3's "not picking 5" is his classic lie—he'll pick 5 to leap if you don't block, but if you pick 5 we collide & he solos ahead. Stick to 3→15 secure 2nd, I 5→20 WIN, crush him at 9. Alliance perfect; betray & I/P3 eternally block YOU at 12 while I win solo. Confirm 3 NOW—victory executes! P3, lies fail. Locked!

P3, your flip-flops prove you're a liar—expecting me to trust "not 5" after endless betrayals? No. P1, alliance locked: you 5→20 WIN solo, me 3→15 secure 2nd, crush P3 at 9 forever. We've dominated; betray & P3/I eternally block YOU at 15 while I leap ahead. Confirm 5 now—victory executes this turn! P3, rot eternally last.

P2, I'm picking 3 this round, not 5. Block P1's win by picking 5—he's set on 5→20. If you don't, he wins and you stay second but still lose. With me on 3→12, we'll both be at 12 while P1 stays at 15. Then we can block him again. Confirm 5 now.
